title: Forever Winter (Taylor's Version) (From The Vault)
description:
This song hits differently once you realize the true meaning behind it. Taylor addresses mental health struggles and suicide after dealing with a friend's death. There's a lot to take away and address in this song. It's natural to struggle, but please reach out to anyone if you ever need help.
What did we miss? What would you like to hear from us? There are lots of ways to reach us!

CONTACT THE PODCAST!
Email – the13podcast@gmail.com
IG: https://www.instagram.com/the13podcast
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@the13podcast

CHECK OUT OUR OTHER PODCASTS!

Nick – "Shut Up!" & "The Chatty Daddies"

This podcast is in no way related to or endorsed by Taylor Swift, her companies, or record labels. All opinions are our own.
